Laos Tips

A tool to help servers quickly calculate tipout

View on GitHub

Welcome!

The shortened URL for this site is: bit.ly/laostips

To start, simply input the number of servers working, indicate the amount of bussers, foodrunners, and bartenders.

  • Servers:
  • Bussers: 0 1 2
  • Foodrunners: 0 1 2
  • Bartenders: 0 1 2

Now, fill in the next fields and we will automatically calculate the tipout for you.

CASHOUT SHEET

  • DINING:
  • NET SALES: $0.00
  • ALCOHOL SALES:
  • GRATUITY:
  • CREDIT CARD FEE: $0.00
  • NET GRATUITY: $0.00

AMOUNT PAID TO

  • BUS: $0.00
  • RUNNER: $0.00
  • BAR: $0.00
  • AMOUNT YOU OWN: $0.00
